original_text: Unless the Lord Almighty had left some of us alive, we would have become like Sodom. We would have been completely destroyed, like Gomorrah.
korean_text: 만군의 여호와께서 우리를 위하여 생존자를 조금 남겨 두지 아니하셨더면 우리가 소돔 같고 고모라 같았으리로다

sentences.original_text: Unless the Lord Almighty had left some of us alive
sentences.korean_translation: 전능하신 주께서 우리 중 몇 사람을 살려두지 않으셨더라면

sentences.original_text: we would have become like Sodom
We would have been completely destroyed
